name: places/ChIJ18WutqNYwokRX1X0TGfUNXE
formattedAddress: 1285 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1285 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA

editorialSummary.text: Eclectic shop for high-end women's clothing, jewelry & home goods, owned by actress Phoebe Cates.

originalText.text: Read the reviews. Are you someone who doesn't check prices? Who really, really, really, really knows who Phoebe Cates is and wants to see her? If so, i would still skip this retail opportunity. I am from NYC, worked at a similar boutique in NYC and never followed anyone around quite like I was. Yes, Phoebe was there, on the phone, but her sole worker stalked me. My mother was blocks away at the hospital and even if I had the 650.00 to buy the articulated sterling silver clown pendant, I wouldn't have, because I wasn't spoken to with a mere hello or small talk, like people actually SHOULD do to to engage. Is this a small shop or a business? I know what I experienced and I won't be back. And yes, these great boutique items are not so unique and can be found 45% off on Amazon with free shipping.

originalText.text: People are chirping about the expensive prices in the store, comparing them to national online retailers like Amazon and eBay. This store is located Manhattan's prestigious Upper East Side, and likewise the prices would naturally reflect the associated costs with operating a store within such a location, and also considering the proprietor also resides in the area. Use some common sense before entering the store. You're not going to find prices comparable to wherever you're from back home like Iowa, Kentucky, or Florida. Sheesh.

originalText.text:
I came to New York on vacation from California to see as much as I could. One must goal was to visit BlueTree. I didn’t get to see Phoebe, but I was lucky enough to see Ivana and Amanda. I bought 2 Chocolate Smiley Face candy things. Do you guys Remember? The front door wouldn’t open to let my daughter and me in and again when we were ready to leave. We had to push the button. It was funny. Amanda had to come to the door to help open it. She said, “we’re still working out the bugs.” I don’t regret not seeing Phoebe, but I do regret not talking to Ivana and Amanda more. You guys are so nice and friendly and I just Froze! I had a lot to talk about, too! I hope I get another chance to get to visit New York.
Thank You Guys!
Mike9994

originalText.text: If you are larger than a size 10, don't even waste your time to show your presence.  You are not welcome due to your size.  They only cater to those of the owner's size.

text.text: If you are larger than a size 10, don't even waste your time to show your presence.  You are not welcome due to your size.  They only cater to those of the owner's size.

originalText.text:
In town from Boston to see a play and the MET.  Had heard of this store, that Phoebe Cates owned it.

Popped in and there she was! She was at the counter when I came in.  Said hi. Was absolutely lovely. Had enough nerve to talk to her as I was leaving.  She was very sweet and personable.

The store is cute and I suspect if I lived on the Upper East Side, I would love it. Cute trinkets. Unique gifts. Definitely check it out!
